Common.ToolTipDesign: Run the report designer to edit the selected report.
Common.ToolTipPublish: Prepare the selected report to be deployed in your application.
Common.ToolTipRunWithoutPreview: Render the selected report without preview
Common.ToolTipViewReport: Show the selected report in the viewer.

DataSource.MessageStartImportDataRelationConfirmati: Do you really want to import data relations for all tables of selected data sources?
DataSource.TextDragDropCloudStoragesHere: Drag & Drop Your Cloud Storages Here!
DataSource.TextDragDropExcelFileHere: Drag & Drop Your Excel Item Here!
DataSource.TextDragDropXmlFileHere: Drag & Drop Your XML Item Here!
DataSource.TextDragDropXsdFileHere: Drag & Drop Your XSD Item Here!
DataSource.ToolTipBuild: Build a connection string using a wizard.
DataSource.ToolTipDragDropYourCloudStorageHere: Drag and drop here a connection to the cloud storage from the tree on the left.
DataSource.ToolTipDragDropYourExcelDocumentHere: Drag and drop here a Excel Document from the tree on the left.
DataSource.ToolTipDragDropYourXmlFileHere: Drag and drop here a XML file from the tree on the left.
DataSource.ToolTipDragDropYourXsdFileHere: Drag and drop here a XSD file from the tree on the left.
DataSource.ToolTipQueryParameterApplyValue: Apply the test value to the current parameter.
DataSource.ToolTipRefreshFrequency: The frequency of data updates from the server.
DataSource.WizardCloudStorageDescription: Create a new Cloud Storage connection.
DataSource.WizardConnectionDescription: Create a new data source on the base of {0} connection.
DataSource.WizardDynamicsNavDescription: Create a new data source on the base of connection with ERP Microsoft Dynamics NAV.
DataSource.WizardExcelDescription: Create a new data source on the base of Excel Document.
DataSource.WizardExcelMapDataDescription: In order to select an arbitrary data range in the Excel sheet, it is necessary to map the data. Otherwise, the entire content of the document will be saved in the data source – a separate table per the worksheet.
DataSource.WizardRecentConnectionsDescription: Create a new data source on the base of the recent connection.
DataSource.WizardXmlDescription: Create a new data source on the base of XML file.

File.MessageFailedAddFollowingFiles: Failed to add the following files. Exceeded the size {0} MB.
File.TextAutomaticNaming: Names of added items will be created automatically!
File.ToolTipDragDropFilesHere: Drag & drop a file here from the file explorer to create an item on its basis. You can also use an existing file item to create a new item. To do this, drag & drop a file item here from the items tree.
File.WizardExcelDataTabDescription: Select the range of data you want to import. Holding down the Ctrl and Shift keys you can select nonadjacent cells and blocks of data.
File.WizardExcelHeadersTabDescription: Select rows that will be used as column headers. They will be created for each column using data of several rows. Holding down the Ctrl key you can select multiple nonadjacent rows. The header may be a string of digits, symbols and spaces or dashes. You can also place the columns in a convenient order, dragging them behind the headers, and removing blank rows and columns.
File.WizardExcelSheetsTabDescription: Select a sheet from which data will be imported.

Items.MessageAttachSelectedItems: Do you want to attach the selected items to '{0}'?
Items.ToolTipGetItem: Get the selected items from the items tree.
Items.ToolTipMoveToRecycleBin: If you move the item into the Recycle Bin you can restore it in the future. Otherwise the item will be deleted without the ability of recovery.
Items.WindowDescriptionCleanRecycleBin: Do you really want to entirely clean the recycle bin? After that, data cannot be restored.
Items.WindowDescriptionCopy: Please check the items you want to copy to the clipboard and click the button "Copy".
Items.WindowDescriptionCut: Please check the items you want to cut to the clipboard and click the button "Cut".
Items.WindowDescriptionPaste: Please select a folder in which you want to paste the items from the clipboard and then click "Insert".

License.MessageEnterUserNameAndPassword: Enter user name (Email) and password to activate
License.MessageEnterUserNameAndPasswordRefreshLi: Enter your user name (Email) and password to refresh the license
License.MessageExpiredLicense: Your Subscription Program expired. You can continue using the license for the Stimulsoft Server. The Subscriptions Program can be renewed at any time.
License.MessageUsingTrialVersion: You are using a trial version of Stimulsoft Server!
License.MessageYouWantDeactivating: Are you sure you want to deactivate the license?

Messages.DataSchemaIsEmpty: Data schema is empty. Try to update the connection!
Messages.IsNotComplyWithFormattingRequirements: The input string does not comply with the formatting requirements!
Messages.IsNotEnterAnyEmailAddress: You did not enter any email address!
Messages.IsRequiredAction: You should add at least one action!
Messages.IsRequiredCalendarDates: You should add at least one element!
Messages.IsRequiredDestinationForReportSnapshot: You should add a destination for placing the result!
Messages.IsRequiredItem: You should add at least one item!
Messages.IsRequiredRecipient: You should add at least one recipient!
Messages.IsRequiredReportTemplate: You should add a report template!
Messages.IsRequiredScheduler: You should add a scheduler to run!
Messages.LoadItem: The current content of the item will be lost! Do you really want to load this item from the file?
Messages.ShareURLOfTheItemHasBeenUpdated: The share URL of the item has been updated!
Messages.ThisSchedulerIsNotOnceScheduler: This scheduler is not a one-time scheduler!

Navigator.LabelCreateCalendar: The calendar can be used to specify days when the scheduler runs.
Navigator.LabelCreateCloudStorage: Create a new connection to the cloud storage. It is used to save the results of the rendered scheduler or load data for rendering.
Navigator.LabelCreateContactList: The list of contacts can be used in the scheduler to send the result of rendering.
Navigator.LabelCreateDataSource: Create the new data source. It is used to render reports.
Navigator.LabelCreateFile: Add the list of files in the items tree.
Navigator.LabelCreateFolder: Creating a new category in which you can place other items.
Navigator.LabelScheduler: It is used to execute commands by a scheduler.
Navigator.MessageAbortUploadingAndCloseWindow: Uploading files on the server. Do you want to abort uploading of files and close the program?
Navigator.ToolTipFind: Find items in the item tree by names.
Navigator.ToolTipNotifications: The notification list that shows the progress of executing commands.
Navigator.ToolTipRecycleBin: Working with items that have been previously deleted and placed in the recycle bin.
Navigator.ToolTipSMTP: Settings of the SMTP server for sending emails.
Navigator.ToolTipSort: Sorting items in the tree by the specified condition.
Navigator.ToolTipViewAll: Show all items in the item tree.
Navigator.ToolTipViewNewest: Show only new items in the item tree.
Navigator.ToolTipViewRecent: Show recently added items in the item tree.

Options.LabelCacheDescription: Caching of information occurs on the hard disk. It works the way it is to speed up the program performance and reduce the load on the server. Eventually, the cache may have a considerable size. In this case, you can to clear it.
Options.LabelLanguageDescription: Select a localization language of the application
Options.LabelOpenDesignerInANewWindow: Open designer in a new window
Options.LabelOpenViewerInANewWindow: Open viewer in a new window
Options.MessageApplyTheme: The new theme will be applied after re-running the application!

Quota.TextContactYourAdministrator: To increase the quota contact your administrator.

ReportSnapshot.LabelSelectExportFormat: Select the format to which you want to save the report
ReportSnapshot.TextPrintingFromServerDescription: Report has too many pages. The pages will be printed by 15 pages at once after loading from server.
ReportSnapshot.TextSaveReport: The report is exported. Click 'Save' to save the result.

ReportTemplate.MessageAttachSelectedItems: Do you want to attach the selected items to the report '{0}'?
ReportTemplate.MessageCloseDesigner: Do you want to save the report before Report Designer closing?
ReportTemplate.MessageEnterDescriptionChanges: Enter a description of report changes.
ReportTemplate.MessageErrorOccurredLoadingReport: An error occurred when loading the report
ReportTemplate.MessageFormsNotSupported: Reports with forms are not supported!
ReportTemplate.TextAutomaticNaming: Names of added items will be created automatically!
ReportTemplate.TextDescriptionChanges: Please, type a description of the changes
ReportTemplate.TextDragDropFilesOrItemsHere: Drag & Drop Items or Files Here
ReportTemplate.ToolTipDragDropItemsOrFilesHere: Drag & drop here a file from the file explorer or items from the tree.
ReportTemplate.ToolTipDragDropItemsHere: Drag & drop items here from the tree to use it in a new dashboard.
ReportTemplate.ToolTipDragDropItemsHereToAttachIt: Drag & drop here a data source from the tree of items to use it in a new report. In addition to the data source you can use images, text or Rich-text files for their displaying in the report. Also other reports can be used to output them as sub-reports.
ReportTemplate.ToolTipDragDropReportTemplatesHere: Drag & drop a report template file here from the file explorer to create a report template on its basis. You can also use an existing report to create a new report. To do this, drag & drop a report template item here from the items tree.
ReportTemplate.ToolTipInfoUsingAttachDataSource: If the data source is attached, its contents (data as schemes, tables, stored procedures etc.) can be used when creating reports.
ReportTemplate.ToolTipInfoUsingAttachImage: The attached image will be a permanent resource of this template. The image can be used in a report without having to load from external sources.
ReportTemplate.ToolTipInfoUsingAttachReportTemplate: The item as a report template will be attached in relation to the created report.
ReportTemplate.ToolTipInfoUsingAttachText: The attached text file can be a source of a text when working with text components of the report, including Rich components.
ReportTemplate.ToolTipInfoUsingAttachXmlXsd: If to attach XML and XSD files to the report, then, a data source will be generated on their base. This data source can be used to create reports.
ReportTemplate.WindowDescriptionNew: Choose, from the options presented above, how to create a new report. Created report template will be placed in "{0}".
ReportTemplate.WizardReportWizardDescription: Create New Report with Help of Wizard

Scheduler.MessageReportDoesNotContainParameters: This report does not contains parameters!
Scheduler.MessageTheFileTypesMustMatch: The type of the copied item must match the type of the item in what it will be copied!
Scheduler.MessageYouCannotUseThisDestinationForThe: You cannot use this destination for the current items!
Scheduler.RadioButtonRepeat: Repeat {0} times with the interval of {1} {2}
Scheduler.TextDragDropAttachedHere: Drag & Drop the Attached Item Here
Scheduler.TextDragDropDestinationHere: Drag & Drop the Destination Item Here
Scheduler.TextFrequency: This field specifies how often the scheduler will run.
Scheduler.TextPressPlusIconAddNewAction: Click the icon plus to add a new action!
Scheduler.ToolTipChangeResultType: Change the way of handling the result of the report creation
Scheduler.ToolTipDaysOfWeek: A day of the week the scheduler will run. You can select a single day, a few different days, or all days immediately. If more than one day is selected, the scheduler will run in each of the selected days.
Scheduler.ToolTipDragDropActionRunReportDestinatio: Drag & Drop a destination item here from the items tree. The destination will contain the result. Also the destination item can be an existing report snapshot or file item. In this case the destination item will be replaced on the result of the report running.
Scheduler.ToolTipDragDropAttachedHere: Drag & Drop the item here from the items tree. The attached item will be sent in the Email.
Scheduler.ToolTipDragDropCalendarHere: Drag & Drop a calendar here from the items tree. The scheduler will run by days specified in the calendar.
Scheduler.ToolTipDragDropDestinationHere: Drag & Drop a destination item here from the items tree. The destination will contain the result. Also the destination item can be an existing report snapshot or file item. In this case the destination item will be replaced by source item.
Scheduler.ToolTipDragDropExceptionCalendarHere: Drag & Drop a calendar here from the items tree. Specified days in the calendar will be ignored by the scheduler. Running the scheduler will be moved to the next day.
Scheduler.ToolTipDragDropItemHere: Drag & Drop a item here from the items tree. The item will be copied when running the scheduler.
Scheduler.ToolTipDragDropReportHere: Drag & Drop a report template here from the items tree. The template will be used when running the scheduler.
Scheduler.ToolTipDragDropSchedulerHere: Drag & Drop a scheduler here from the items tree. When the main scheduler runs (the one that is being created or modified) then it can run other schedulers (the ones that are dragged in this field). Only one level of nesting is supported to run the schedulers. The scheduler that was run by another scheduler cannot run one more scheduler.
Scheduler.ToolTipEndDate: Run the scheduler not later than at this time.
Scheduler.ToolTipExcludeWeekendDays: Check this box if you want the scheduler not to run at weekend days.
Scheduler.ToolTipRunAtDay: The day when the scheduler is run can be selected in two ways. The first way is to specify a particular day of the month (from 1 to 31 or the last day of the month). The second way is to specify which day of the week it is and a number of this day of the week in the month. For example, "The first Monday of the month", "The third Wednesday of the month". Both ways allow selecting more than one day in a month.
Scheduler.ToolTipRunAtDayOnce: A day, when the scheduler run.
Scheduler.ToolTipRunAtMinute: A minute when the scheduler runs (range from 1 to 60).
Scheduler.ToolTipRunAtMonth: A month, when the scheduler is running. You can select one, several, or all months. The scheduler will run in each of the selected month.
Scheduler.ToolTipRunAtMonthOnce: A month, when the scheduler runs.
Scheduler.ToolTipRunAtTime: The time at which the scheduler will run.
Scheduler.ToolTipRunEvery: If to specify a value 1, the scheduler will run forever. If to specify a value 2 then, every first time, the scheduler will not run. Every second time - it will. If to specify a value 3, then, every third time, the scheduler will run. Every first and second time it will be ignored etc.
Scheduler.ToolTipStartDate: Run the scheduler not ealier than at this time.
Scheduler.ToolTipTimeZone: Run the scheduler by the time zone.
Scheduler.WizardCalendarDescription: Run the scheduler on dates specified in the selected calendar.
Scheduler.WizardDailyDescription: Once a day, at a specified time.
Scheduler.WizardMonthlyDescription: Monthly, on selected days of the week or days of the month, at a specified time.
Scheduler.WizardOnceDescription: Run the scheduler once at any time.
Scheduler.WizardWeeklyDescription: On the selected days of the week, at a specified time.
Scheduler.WizardYearlyDescription: Every year, in a particular month, day and time.

Update.MessageUnableCheckForUpdates: Unable to check for updates. Click 'Try Again', to check for updates again.
